contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Our luxurious bath mat is spun from premium long-staple Turkish cotton. Exceptionally dense, soft, and absorbent with dense 1,400 gsm weight. Treat your feet right. Comes in set of two.
contentfulProduct.title: Turkish Cotton Bath Mat Bundle
contentfulProduct.subtitle: Traditional retail price $130

content.value: Add a pair of Organic Turkish Waffle Slippers to your order for just $14.90 $24.90
Our luxurious bath mat is spun from premium long-staple Turkish cotton. Exceptionally dense, soft, and absorbent with dense 1,400 gsm weight. Treat your feet right. Comes in set of two.
Made from 100% premium, long staple Turkish cotton
Set includes two 24" x 36" luxury spa quality bath mats
1,400 grams per square meter
Made with care in Turkey

Machine wash cool with like colors using mild laundry detergent. Avoid washing with items that have zippers, Velcro, hooks, or other sharp objects that could snag or pull the loops. In the event of a snagged loop, cut it with scissors. Avoid contact with skin care products to prevent discoloration. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or hang dry. Remove promptly.
